comment:
по клику на бочку/цистерну со смазкой, в которой устроили купальню
новый обж, например из tech_props_barrel_01

languages.text: Отпечатки рук и ног указывают, что аборигены превратили цистерну со священной смазкой в подобие ритуальной купальни.
The handprints and footprints indicate that the locals have turned the sacred unguent tank into something like a ritual font.
languages.original_text: Отпечатки рук и ног указывают, что аборигены превратили цистерну со священной смазкой в подобие ритуальной купальни.

traits.locale_text: The handprints and footprints indicate that the locals have turned the sacred unguent tank into something like a ritual fount.
The handprints and footprints indicate that the locals have turned the sacred unguent tank into something like a ritual fount.
The handprints and footprints indicate that the locals have turned the sacred unguent tank into something like a ritual fount.
The handprints and footprints indicate that the locals have turned the sacred unguent tank into something like a ritual fount.
The handprints and footprints indicate that the locals have turned the sacred unguent tank into something like a ritual font.
The handprints and footprints indicate that the locals have turned the sacred unguent tank into something like a ritual font.

languages.text: 手型と足型から、この地域は儀式の源泉のような存在である聖なる軟膏の貯蔵タンクに変わってしまったことがわかる。
languages.original_text: The handprints and footprints indicate that the locals have turned the sacred unguent tank into something like a ritual font.

traits.locale_text: 手型と足型から、この地域は儀式の源泉のような存在である聖なる軟膏の貯蔵タンクに変わってしまったことがわかる。

languages.text: 这些手印和脚印表明，当地人将这个圣膏容器做成了类似仪式喷泉的东西。
languages.original_text: The handprints and footprints indicate that the locals have turned the sacred unguent tank into something like a ritual font.

traits.locale_text: 这些手印和脚印表明，当地人将这个圣膏容器做成了类似仪式喷泉的东西。

languages.text: Les empreintes de mains et de pieds semblent indiquer que les locaux ont fait du réservoir d'onguent sacré une sorte de fontaine rituelle.
languages.original_text: The handprints and footprints indicate that the locals have turned the sacred unguent tank into something like a ritual font.

traits.locale_text: Les empreintes de mains et de pieds semblent indiquer que les locaux ont fait du réservoir d'onguent sacré une sorte de fontaine rituelle.

languages.text: Las huellas y pisadas indican que los lugareños han convertido el tanque de ungüento sagrado en una especie de fuente ritual.
languages.original_text: The handprints and footprints indicate that the locals have turned the sacred unguent tank into something like a ritual font.

traits.locale_text: Las huellas y pisadas indican que los lugareños han convertido el tanque de ungüento sagrado en una especie de fuente ritual.

languages.text: Die Hand- und Fußabdrücke deuten darauf hin, dass die Einheimischen den Tank für das heilige Salböl in eine Art rituellen Brunnen verwandelt haben.
languages.original_text: The handprints and footprints indicate that the locals have turned the sacred unguent tank into something like a ritual font.

traits.locale_text: Die Hand- und Fußabdrücke deuten darauf hin, dass die Einheimischen den Tank für das heilige Salböl in eine Art rituellen Brunnen verwandelt haben.

languages.text: El ve ayak izleri gösteriyor ki burada yaşayanlar, kutsal özyağ tanklarını bir ayin nesnesine dönüştürmüş.
languages.original_text: The handprints and footprints indicate that the locals have turned the sacred unguent tank into something like a ritual font.

traits.locale_text: El ve ayak izleri gösteriyor ki burada yaşayanlar kutsal özyağ tanklarını bir ayin nesnesine dönüştürmüşler.
